title: Mikrotik WInbox Integration BUG
author: Galandrix
body_snippet:
Hello, could you please fix winbox integration? When i start winbox, gray window is apear.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27976371/115115173-8977a900-9f9b-11eb-9b82-53cf43e739af.png)

iterations.description: Issue body is empty with no description of the actual bug, and while reporter confirms it still happens with Winbox 3.42 64-bit, we need details on what exactly fails (embedding, focus, crash?), steps to reproduce, and error logs

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage (P3 stale status): this issue is labeled as actively worked, but activity appears stale. Please confirm whether work is still in progress. If not, please relabel to Need 2 check (or close) to keep status labels accurate.

comments.author: Galandrix
comments.snippet: I have tested on mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3228 - still exist, but where to find - fork v1.79.x or upstream dev?

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Thanks for testing! The fork releases are available here:
- **v1.80.0** (latest): https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/releases/tag/v1.80.0
- **v1.79.0**: https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/releases/tag/v1.79.0

v1.80.0 also includes self-contained builds (no .NET runtime needed). Please test with the v1.80.0 build and let us know if the Winbox integration issue persists there as well.

comments.author: Galandrix
comments.snippet: 64bit, i can send you a video if you want,

notes:
AI triage: Issue body is empty with no description of the actual bug, and while reporter confirms it still happens with Winbox 3.42 64-bit, we need details on what exactly fails (embedding, focus, crash?), steps to reproduce, and error logs
Approach: Need reporter to describe the specific Winbox integration failure (embedding issue, focus loss, crash, etc.), provide steps to reproduce, and share any error output before we can investigate the IntApp protocol handler
